interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Chucky: The Killer DVD Collection
Review Date: 2015/10/25
Store: Alex Vincent  (Actor),     Justin Whalin  (Actor),     Don Mancini  (Director, Writer),     Ronny Yu  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', "Set a play date with Chucky as his gory legacy lives on in this horrifying and hilarious four-movie collection. Watch the killer doll as he torments his original victim, young Andy Barclay, in Child's Play 2 and Child's Play 3. Then the ruthless redhead teams up with his dream doll, Tiffany (Jennifer Tilly), in Bride of Chucky and Seed of Chucky. Oozing with bonus materials, Chucky The Killer DVD Collection is a thrilling, chilling, campy, must-own set. Wanna play?Bonus Content:", "Disc 1 - Child's Play 2:", 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', "Disc 1 - Child's Play 3:", 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 2 - Bride of Chucky:', 'Feature Commentary with Director Ronny Yu', 'Feature Commentary with Director Ronny Yu', 'Feature Commentary with Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif and Don Mancini', 'Feature Commentary with Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif and Don Mancini', 'Spotlight on Location', 'Spotlight on Location', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 2 - Seed of Chucky:', 'Feature Commenary with writer/director Don Mancini and actress Jennifer Tilly', 'Feature Commenary with writer/director Don Mancini and actress Jennifer Tilly', 'Conceiving the Seed of Chucky', 'Conceiving the Seed of Chucky', 'Tilly on The Tonight Show', 'Tilly on The Tonight Show', 'Family Hell-iday Slide Show.', 'Family Hell-iday Slide Show.', 'Amazon.com', 'The most unlikely horror-movie icon this side of', 'Leprechaun', ', the homicidal doll Chucky has blossomed into one of the most recognizable faces of fright fare over the last two decades, and this double-disc set chronicles four of his most monstrous misadventures. The original--and still quite creepy--', "Child's Play", 'feature (from 1988) is not included in the set (that title is owned by MGM, and this set is a Universal release), so the', 'Killer DVD Collection', 'kicks off with the more formulaic', "Child's Play 2", '(1990) and', '3', "('91, directed by", 'Lost', 'producer/director Jack Bender), both of which are saved only by veteran character actor Brad Dourif as the voice of Chucky. The series received a much-needed shot in the arm in 1998 with', 'Bride of Chucky', ", an over-the-top revamp that dispensed with the tired horror-movie mechanics and dove headfirst into a gleeful mix of camp and gore; much of the credit for that film's success must go to Hong Kong director Ronny Yu (", 'Bride with White Hair', '), who imparts much visual flair to the proceedings and Jennifer Tilly as an amoral moll whose attempt to free the killer that possesses Chucky results in another monster doll on the loose. The fifth (and to date, final)', "Child's Play", '/Chucky feature,', 'Seed of Chucky', ", rounds out the set; it strives for the humor-horror quotient of Yu's film, and yields mixed results.", 'No extras are featured on the first two sequels, but both', 'Bride', 'and', 'Seed', 'offer up commentaries and featurettes for the devoted Chucky fans.', 'Bride', 'gets two commentaries--one with Yu, and the other with Dourif, Tilly, and scriptwriter Don Mancini, while', 'Seed', "'s commentary has Mancini (who was promoted to director) and Tilly. Making-of featurettes for both features are also included, as well as a clip of Tilly on", 'The Tonight Show', '. None of these supplements will be new to the longtime', "Child's Play", 'collector--all have been released on previous single and multi-disc sets--and buyers should know that they will find the R-rated versions of', 'Bride', 'and', 'Seed', "here, and not the unrated versions (which have also been previously released). So it's fans looking to fill in the Chucky gap in their DVD libraries that will benefit the most from the", 'Killer DVD Collection', '.', '--Paul Gaita']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '61030924', 'Director': 'Don Mancini, Ronny Yu, John Lafia, Jack Bender', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '5 hours and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 19, 2006', 'Actors': 'Alex Vincent, Justin Whalin, Jennifer Tilly, Jenny Agutter, Perrey Reeves', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Producers': 'David Kirschner, Corey Sienega, Robert Latham Brown, Grace Gilroy', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Don Mancini', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: just like i remember when i was a kid
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0

profile: The user exhibits a strong affinity for classic horror films, particularly those featuring iconic characters and campy elements, as demonstrated by their purchase of a Chucky DVD collection. They appreciate nostalgia, as indicated by their comment about remembering the films from childhood. The review rating of 5 stars suggests a high level of satisfaction with the product, reinforcing their preference for quality content within this genre. The user appears to favor collections that offer comprehensive features and bonus materials, indicating an interest in in-depth exploration of films, such as commentaries and making-of featurettes. Overall, their purchasing behavior and engagement point to a dedicated interest in horror cinema, with a particular focus on classic series that blend humor with fright.
